SELECT ROWNUM ,NO ,LAB_NO ,TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS startDate ,TO_CHAR(EXPIRY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS expiryDate ,NOTE ,STATE FROM ( SELECT NO,LAB_NO,START_DATE,EXPIRY_DATE,NOTE,PLEDGE,STATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE START_DATE >= SYSDATE )
WHERE LAB_NO = #{labNo} AND STATE='A'
WHERE LAB_NO = #{labNo} AND START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startcalender},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{startcalender},'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999 AND STATE='A'
ORDER BY ROWNUM
